HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: I once glued a set of false teeth to the Boomerang.^${12 39 c7}That came back to bite me.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: A broken stick is just as good as a Master Sword. Who knew?

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.
